formElement.label: Cobertura's location:
formElement.documentation: Directory where Cobertura binaries are located.

formElement.label: Path to java:
formElement.documentation: Path where java bin is located.

formElement.label: Classes:
formElement.documentation: Class files to be analyzed or a root directory containing class files.

formElement.label: Instrumented classes's directory:
formElement.documentation: Path where the instrumented classes will be stored.

formElement.label: Datafile:
formElement.documentation: Specify the name of the file to use for storing the metadata about your classes. Example: C:\TestCoverage\cobertura.ser

formElement.label: Base Directory:
formElement.documentation: Specify the base directory containing the classes you want to instrument.

formElement.label: ClassPath Directories:
formElement.documentation: Additional classpath to add when running the test.

formElement.label: Test Command:
formElement.documentation: Basically the same commandline you always run to execute the tests.

formElement.label: Report Folder:
formElement.documentation: Specify the output directory for the report.

formElement.label: Report format:
formElement.documentation: The type of report you want to generate. either a xml or html

formElement.label: Source Directory:
formElement.documentation: Directory where sources are stored (src folder)

formElement.label: Minimum branch coverage per class:
formElement.documentation: Specify the minimum acceptable branch coverage rate needed by each class. This should be an integer value between 0 and 100.

formElement.label: Minimum line Coverage per class:
formElement.documentation: Specify the minimum acceptable line coverage rate needed by each class. This should be an integer value between 0 and 100.

formElement.label: Minimum branch coverage per package:
formElement.documentation: Specify the minimum acceptable average branch coverage rate needed by each package. This should be an integer value between 0 and 100.

formElement.label: Minimum line coverage per package:
formElement.documentation: Specify the minimum acceptable average line coverage rate needed by each package. This should be an integer value between 0 and 100.

formElement.label: Minimum Total Branch Coverage:
formElement.documentation: Specify the minimum acceptable average branch coverage rate needed by the project as a whole. This should be an integer value between 0 and 100.

formElement.label: Minimum Total Line Coverage:
formElement.documentation: Specify the minimum acceptable average line coverage rate needed by the project as a whole. This should be an integer value between 0 and 100.

formElement.label: Instrument additional commands:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands for cobertura-instrument.

formElement.label: Report additional commands:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands for cobertura-report.

formElement.label: Check coverage additional commands:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands for cobertura-check.

formElement.label: Working directory:
formElement.documentation: Working directory, blank will assume default job workspace root.
